attributes.action: Cancel road fund licence and replace with a fuel charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The costs of collecting the tax and chasing non payers are removed,and high users pay more and low users pay less,everyone pays on useage of the roads, small car owners will also pay less than large car owners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
